name: Enlisted
description: This is the windows standalone version with DXVK.
notes: Instructions for DXVK support: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/How-to:-DXVK Change to "full screen (window mode)" If you have multiple monitors and the mouse doesn't stay in the game window. Sometimes the game doesn't quit completely. You need to close it with a right click on the wine system tray icon or by stopping the game with lutris.

task.name: wineexec
task.description:
Installing the game.
------------------------------
Let Lutris installer finish first. UNCHECK launch Enlisted before you close the installer!

content:
files:
- game:
    filename: wt_launcher.exe
    url: https://yupmaster.gaijinent.com/launcher/current.php?id=EnlistedLauncher
game:
  exe: drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Enlisted/launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating 64bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial
    description: Installing Arial font
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: 'Installing the game.

      ------------------------------

      Let Lutris installer finish first. UNCHECK launch Enlisted before you close
      the installer!'
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
